newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Citrix buy repeated.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Citrix buy repeated.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist said its analyst Christopher Galvin repeated his buy recommendation on shares of Citrix Systems Inc calling Thursday's nearly 25 percent drop in the share price "unwarranted" and "not indicative of a fundamental change in opportunity or near-term business."
-- In a statement, Galvin said he anticipates and "upbeat March quarter" earnings report, and said the company's mid-1997 release of its WinFrame 2.0 software is on track.
-- He said conversations with Citrix and Microsoft Corp management on Thursday indicated a healthy relationship between the two companies.
-- Shares were trading up 3-3/8 at 32-1/2 in early afternoon exchange trading.
